tasks.title: Foundation Layer: Authentication, Database Schema, and API Infrastructure
tasks.description: Implement the foundational components that all other features depend on: 1) User Authentication and Authorization - User registration, login, password management, session management, basic security measures (JWT, password hashing, HTTPS). 2) Database Schema and Core Data Models - User model, account model, transaction model, category model, goal model, budget model with proper relationships. 3) Basic API Infrastructure - RESTful API framework, authentication middleware, error handling, request validation.
tasks.details: Use industry-standard libraries and frameworks to ensure the application is secure. Implement a defense-in-depth strategy with multiple layers of protection.
tasks.testStrategy: Test security measures using penetration testing, vulnerability scanning, and code reviews.

subtasks.title: Implement User Authentication and Authorization
subtasks.description: Develop user registration, login, password management, session management, and basic security measures (JWT, password hashing, HTTPS).
subtasks.details: Use a secure authentication library to handle JWT, password hashing, and HTTPS.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test user authentication using penetration testing, vulnerability scanning, and code reviews.

subtasks.title: Implement Database Schema and Core Data Models
subtasks.description: Develop User model, account model, transaction model, category model, goal model, budget model with proper relationships.
subtasks.details: Use an object-relational mapping library to ensure database schema is correct and consistent.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test database schema using data validation and consistency checks.

subtasks.title: Implement Basic API Infrastructure
subtasks.description: Develop RESTful API framework, authentication middleware, error handling, request validation.
subtasks.details: Use a lightweight API framework to ensure high performance and scalability.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test API infrastructure using load testing and performance benchmarking.

tasks.title: Design for User Experience
tasks.description: Create a simple, intuitive, and visually appealing user interface that makes financial management enjoyable.
tasks.details: Use design principles and best practices to ensure the application is easy to use. Conduct usability testing to identify areas for improvement.
tasks.testStrategy: Test user experience using A/B testing, usability testing, and customer feedback.

tasks.title: Implement Automation Features
tasks.description: Develop features that automatically track and categorize transactions, freeing up user time for more important tasks.
tasks.details: Use machine learning algorithms to improve transaction classification accuracy. Implement automated savings goals and investment tracking.
tasks.testStrategy: Test automation features using data-driven testing and A/B testing.

tasks.title: Phase 1 MVP: Single Bank Account Integration with Plaid
tasks.description: Implement Plaid integration for single bank account connections. Components: Plaid integration setup, account connection flow, transaction import (last 90 days initially), manual account sync capability, account balance display, account disconnection functionality. This is the core feature that enables automatic transaction tracking.
tasks.details: Set up Plaid API integration, implement OAuth flow for account connection, handle transaction imports, and provide manual sync functionality. This enables users to connect their bank accounts and automatically import transactions.
tasks.testStrategy: Test integrations using API testing, penetration testing, and real-user monitoring.

subtasks.title: Phase 1 MVP: Single Bank Account Integration with Plaid
subtasks.description: Set up Plaid integration for single bank account connections. Implement account connection flow, transaction import (last 90 days initially), manual account sync capability, account balance display, and account disconnection functionality.
subtasks.details: Use Plaid APIs to integrate with banks and retrieve user account data securely. Implement secure authentication and authorization protocols for the integration.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test integrations using API testing and real-user monitoring.

tasks.title: Develop Mobile-First Strategy
tasks.description: Design the application for mobile devices first, ensuring a seamless experience across various screen sizes and orientations.
tasks.details: Use responsive design principles to ensure the application adapts to different screen sizes. Implement touch-friendly navigation and UI elements.
tasks.testStrategy: Test mobile-first strategy using mobile-specific testing tools and user feedback.

tasks.title: Develop Scalable Architecture
tasks.description: Design the application for scalability, ensuring it can handle increased traffic and user growth without compromising performance.
tasks.details: Use cloud-native technologies to ensure scalability. Implement load balancing, auto-scaling, and containerization.
tasks.testStrategy: Test scalability using load testing, stress testing, and benchmarking.

tasks.title: Implement Data Retention Policy
tasks.description: Develop a data retention policy that ensures user data is securely stored and accessed only with consent.
tasks.details: Use encryption to protect user data. Implement access controls and audit logs to track data access.
tasks.testStrategy: Test data retention policy using penetration testing, vulnerability scanning, and code reviews.

tasks.title: Develop Business Model
tasks.description: Create a business model that generates revenue through various channels, including premium features and affiliate partnerships.
tasks.details: Implement subscription-based pricing for premium features. Partner with financial institutions to offer co-branded products.
tasks.testStrategy: Test business model using market analysis, competitor research, and user feedback.

tasks.title: Phase 1 MVP: Basic Transaction Management
tasks.description: Implement transaction list view with pagination, transaction detail view, manual transaction categorization, basic filtering, and search functionality.
tasks.details: Build upon the foundation (task 1) and bank integration (task 4). Implement transaction list view with pagination, transaction detail view, manual transaction categorization (select from predefined categories), basic transaction filtering (by date, category, amount), and transaction search functionality. This allows users to view and manage their imported transactions.
tasks.testStrategy: Test this feature using a combination of manual testing (e.g., verifying pagination, filtering, and search functionality) and automated testing (e.g., API tests for transaction creation and retrieval).

tasks.title: Implement Category System for Transactions
tasks.description: Develop a system to categorize transactions into predefined expense and income categories, assign category icons and colors, and enable manual assignment of categories to transactions.
tasks.details: Build upon transaction management (task 9). Implement predefined expense categories (groceries, dining, transportation, utilities, entertainment, shopping, healthcare, education, other) and income categories (salary, freelance, investment, other). Add category icons and colors, and enable manual category assignment to transactions. This enables transaction categorization and sets the foundation for budgeting.
tasks.testStrategy: Test this feature using a combination of automated testing (e.g., API tests for category creation and retrieval) and manual testing (e.g., verifying category assignment, icons, and colors functionality). Ensure that category selection is seamless and accessible through multiple user interfaces. Conduct thorough security review to ensure data integrity and protection.

tasks.title: Phase 1 MVP: Basic Dashboard
tasks.description: Implement a basic dashboard to provide users with a quick overview of their financial status, including account balance summary, recent transactions list, current month spending summary, savings goal progress display, and simple spending chart.
tasks.details: Build upon transaction management (task 9), categories (task 10), and can display savings goals (task 12). Implement account balance summary, recent transactions list (last 10-15 transactions), current month spending summary, savings goal progress display, and simple spending chart (current month by category). This provides users with a quick overview of their financial status.
tasks.testStrategy: Test this feature using a combination of automated testing (e.g., API tests for dashboard data retrieval) and manual testing (e.g., verifying dashboard layout, data accuracy, and usability). Ensure that the dashboard is easy to navigate and provides an accurate overview of users' financial status.

tasks.title: Phase 1 MVP: Single Savings Goal
tasks.description: Create one savings goal with name, target amount, and optional deadline, manual progress tracking (user enters contributions), progress visualization (progress bar, percentage complete), basic goal completion forecast.
tasks.details: Build upon the foundation (task 1). Implement goal creation with name, target amount, and optional deadline. Enable manual progress tracking where users enter contributions, display progress visualization (progress bar, percentage complete), and provide basic goal completion forecast. This provides motivation and purpose for using the app. Goals can be built independently and displayed on the dashboard (task 11).
tasks.testStrategy: Test this feature using a combination of automated testing (e.g., API tests for goal creation and retrieval) and manual testing (e.g., verifying progress tracking, visualization, and forecast functionality). Ensure that user inputs are correctly stored and displayed in the app. Conduct usability testing to identify areas for improvement.
